title: HIST-AID: Leveraging Historical Patient Reports for Enhanced Multi-Modal Automatic Diagnosis
details: H Huang, CM Deniz, K Cho, S Chopra, D Madaan - arXiv preprint arXiv:2411.10684, 2024
abstract: Chest X-ray imaging is a widely accessible and non-invasive diagnostic tool for detecting thoracic abnormalities. While numerous AI models assist radiologists in interpreting these images, most overlook patients' historical data. To bridge this gap …
